snippet: After a full day of hunting in thick woods, State Police troopers were preparing to strengthen their perimeter around the area after dark and halt searching until daylight.
abstract: Police in Upstate New York are narrowing their search for escaped murderers Richard Matt and David Sweat to five-square-mile area just east of Clinton Correctional Facility in Dannemora, NY; manhunt continues for sixth day after false leads and dead ends.

byline.original: By JESSE McKINLEY and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM
byline.contributor: Jesse McKinley reported from Cadyville, and William K. Rashbaum from New York. Rick Rojas and Sarah Maslin Nir contributed reporting from Cadyville, and Ashley Southall from New York.

lead_paragraph: After a full day of hunting in thick woods, State Police troopers were preparing to strengthen their perimeter around the area after dark and halt searching until daylight.

headline.main: Authorities Hunting for 2 Escapees Focus on 5-Square-Mile Area Near Prison
headline.print_headline: Authorities Hunting for 2 Escapees Focus on 5 Square Mile Area Near Prison
